author: orenyomtov
content: I'm looking for a list of projects that are using a light client - does anyone know of any? Even specific examples you you of would be very useful

author: etan_status
content: https://eth-light.xyz uses a light client to follow the chain, and allows displaying how transactions / receipts are encoded on the wire (RLP button), and also shows how it would be encoded in EIP-6493 SSZ format
